activities.name: Robotics Team
activities.description: Led mechanical design for competitive robotics team, specializing in automated systems
activities.impact: Team advanced to state championships, won innovation award for sustainable design

activities.name: First-Gen College Prep Program
activities.description: Helped other first-generation students navigate college application process and scholarship opportunities
activities.impact: Assisted 25+ students, increased college enrollment from program by 40%

activities.name: Family Restaurant
activities.description: Helped manage family's small restaurant, handling inventory, scheduling, and customer service
activities.impact: Increased efficiency and reduced food waste by 30% through better inventory systems

core_values.description: Strong commitment to supporting family business and helping other first-generation students succeed
Believe in creating solutions that are both technically sound and practically useful
Passionate about making college and STEM fields more accessible to underrepresented students

defining_moments.title: Balancing Family Obligations with Academic Dreams
defining_moments.description: When my father's restaurant struggled during COVID, I had to work 25+ hours per week while maintaining my grades and robotics commitments. I felt torn between family loyalty and my own aspirations, but eventually found ways to apply my engineering skills to help the restaurant become more efficient.
defining_moments.emotional_impact: Stressed and conflicted initially, then proud to find solutions that helped both goals
defining_moments.lessons_learned: Sometimes the best way to pursue your dreams is to find ways they can also help your family

defining_moments.title: Being the Only Latina on the Robotics Team
defining_moments.description: Starting robotics as a sophomore, I was intimidated being the only Latina girl on a team of mostly white and Asian boys. However, I discovered my unique perspective on design and problem-solving was valuable. I learned to speak up confidently and eventually became mechanical design lead.
defining_moments.emotional_impact: Felt out of place initially, then empowered as I found my voice and contribution
defining_moments.lessons_learned: Diversity of perspective makes teams stronger, and representation matters for future students

defining_moments.title: Helping Other First-Gen Students Navigate College Applications
defining_moments.description: When I became a first-gen ambassador, I met students who had higher grades than me but less knowledge about college opportunities. I realized how much my parents' lack of college experience had been a barrier, but also how much I could help others by sharing what I'd learned.
defining_moments.emotional_impact: Frustrated by systemic barriers, then motivated to help change them
defining_moments.lessons_learned: Knowledge and opportunity should be shared, not hoarded—lifting others up lifts everyone

model_extra.essay_prompt: Briefly describe extracurricular, work, travel, or family responsibilities that shaped you.
